tasks.title: 🔧 Fix Kanban Responsiveness
tasks.description:
Make Kanban columns fluid and responsive to window resize. Currently uses fixed 300px widths that don't adapt.

**Agent:** CSS-Architect
**Status:** In Progress

**Requirements:**
- Replace flexbox fixed widths with CSS Grid auto-fit
- Columns should expand on large screens, stack on small
- Maintain horizontal scroll on mobile
- Test: 320px to 4K resolution

**Deliverable:** Updated CSS in index.html

tasks.title: 🎨 Add Theme System (Nord + Claude)
tasks.description:
Implement theme switcher with 3 themes: Current (Gruvbox), Nord (Arctic Blue), Claude (Anthropic-inspired).

**Agent:** CSS-Architect
**Status:** In Progress

**Nord Palette:**
- bg: #2e3440, #3b4252, #434c5e
- text: #d8dee9, #e5e9f0, #eceff4
- accents: #88c0d0, #a3be8c, #bf616a, #d08770, #ebcb8b, #b48ead

**Claude Palette:**
- bg: #1a1a2e, #16213e, #0f3460
- text: #e94560 (coral), #f5f5f5
- accents: #f39c12, #e74c3c, #3498db, #2ecc71

**Deliverable:** Theme switcher dropdown + CSS variables

subtasks.title: Add theme switcher dropdown to header

tasks.title: 🎙️ Voice Task Creation
tasks.description:
Add voice input for creating tasks. Speak to add tasks instead of typing.

**Agent:** Voice-Integration-Dev
**Status:** In Progress

**Implementation:**
- Web Speech API (webkitSpeechRecognition)
- Mic button on column headers and Add Task modal
- Parse: "Add [task] to [column]"
- Visual recording indicator

**Deliverable:** Working voice-to-task flow

tasks.title: 📱 PWA + Mobile Deployment
tasks.description:
Make Mission Control installable as Progressive Web App and mobile-ready.

**Agent:** Mobile-Deployment-Eng
**Status:** In Progress

**Tasks:**
- Create manifest.json
- Create service worker (sw.js) for offline
- Add to Home Screen support

- iOS/Android testing notes

**Deliverable:** manifest.json + sw.js + mobile guide

subtasks.title: Add PWA meta tags to index.html

tasks.title: 🚀 Onboarding Guide — Set Up Mission Control
tasks.description:
Welcome to Mission Control! Follow these steps to complete your setup. Work through each subtask in order.

**Tip:** Click on a subtask to see detailed instructions. Check it off when done.

subtasks.title: 1. Enable GitHub Pages: Settings → Pages → Branch: main → Save
2. Create GitHub Token: github.com/settings/tokens → Generate (classic) → Scope: repo
3. Connect Dashboard: Open your GitHub Pages URL → Click 'Connect GitHub' → Paste token
4. Install Tailscale: brew install tailscale && tailscale up
5. Enable Funnel: tailscale funnel 18789 → Copy your URL
6. Generate Webhook Token: openssl rand -hex 32 → Save it
7. Add GitHub Webhook: Settings → Webhooks → Add → URL: https://YOUR-TAILSCALE-URL/hooks/github?token=YOUR-TOKEN
8. Test: Create a task, move to In Progress, verify MoltBot receives notification

comments.author: Mission Control
comments.text: Once all steps are complete, you can archive this guide or keep it as reference. Your setup is done when MoltBot responds to task changes!

tasks.title: 📖 User Guide — How to Use Mission Control
tasks.description:
Learn how to use Mission Control effectively. Both you AND MoltBot can manage tasks!

**Two ways to manage tasks:**
• 👤 **You** — Use the Dashboard UI (drag & drop, buttons, forms)
• 🤖 **MoltBot** — Uses CLI scripts or edits tasks.json directly

subtasks.title: Columns: Permanent (recurring) → Backlog → In Progress → Review → Done
Drag & Drop: Move tasks between columns to change status
Click task card to open details and edit
👤 You: Click '+' button in any column header
🤖 MoltBot: Edits data/tasks.json or uses CLI
Title: Short, clear name for the task
Subtasks: Break work into smaller steps (checkable)
Comments: Add notes, feedback, or progress updates
1. Create task in Backlog with clear description
2. Move to 'In Progress' → MoltBot gets notified via webhook
3. MoltBot works on task, updates subtasks & adds comments
5. You review: Approve → Done, or add feedback → back to In Progress
📁 Project filter: Click project buttons to filter
📦 Archive: Store completed tasks out of sight
🤖 Can CREATE tasks (via CLI or JSON)
🤖 Can UPDATE task status, subtasks, comments
🤖 Receives WEBHOOK when you move tasks to In Progress

comments.author: Mission Control
comments.text: This guide stays in Permanent so you can always reference it. The subtasks aren't meant to be 'completed' — they're documentation!

tasks.title: Example Task — Delete me when ready!
tasks.description:
This is an example of what a real task looks like. Feel free to edit or delete it.

**Good task descriptions include:**
- What needs to be done
- Why it matters
- Any constraints or requirements
- Links to relevant resources

tasks.title: 🔐 Security: Sandbox Mode Decision
tasks.description:
Decide on sandboxing strategy for local models.

**Context:**
- OpenClaw flagged security risk: 30B local models (qwen3-coder-30b) have full system access
- Current: sandbox=OFF (fastest, full access)
- Options:
  1. OFF: No protection, max speed
  2. non-main: Subagents only sandboxed (1-2s delay)
  3. all: Everything sandboxed (safest, slower)

**Blocker:** Need to decide tradeoff between security and convenience for local model code generation/image tasks.

subtasks.title: Decide on security vs speed preference

comments.author: Nomura
comments.text: Parked on 2026-02-06. User wants full access for now but may revisit later. Current: sandbox=OFF, local models have unrestricted write access.

tasks.title: 🔧 Fix: Make Mission Control Responsive
tasks.description:
Fix layout scaling issues - dashboard does not reshape relative to window size. Currently unusable on different screen sizes.

**Problems:**
- Fixed layout doesn't adapt to window resizing
- Columns/elements overflow or get cut off
- Not usable on mobile or resized windows
- No breakpoints for different screen sizes

**Solution:**
- Add CSS media queries for responsive breakpoints
- Make Kanban board scrollable/flexible
- Responsive grid for task cards
- Collapsible sidebar on small screens
- Mobile-friendly touch targets

**Priority:** BLOCKER - must fix before adding new features

comments.author: İrtek
comments.text: Page does not scale/reshape relative to window size. Not usable like this. Must be dynamic!

comments.author: Nomura
comments.text:
✅ FIXED using UI/UX Pro Max skill!

Changes made:
- Added 4 responsive breakpoints (mobile/tablet/desktop/wide)
- CSS Grid for Kanban columns (replaces fixed widths)
- CSS Custom Properties for fluid spacing
- Touch target optimizations (44x44px minimum)
- Scroll snap for mobile carousel experience
- Reduced motion support
- Print styles for task exports

Now scales perfectly from 320px mobile to 4K widescreen!

tasks.title: 💬 Add Chat Window to Mission Control
tasks.description:
Integrate live chat with Nomura directly in the Mission Control dashboard.

**User Story:**
"As a user, I want to chat with Nomura while viewing my tasks so I can ask questions and get updates without switching apps."

**Features:**
- ✅ Floating chat widget (bottom-right)
- ✅ WebSocket connection to OpenClaw gateway
- ✅ Real-time messaging
- ✅ Responsive design (mobile-friendly)
- ✅ Collapsible widget
- ✅ Typing indicators
- ✅ Auto-reconnect

**Technical:**
- WebSocket to ws://192.168.1.51:18750
- Routes via Telegram channel
- Token authentication
- Mobile-responsive (bottom on small screens)

subtasks.title: Design chat UI (side panel vs floating)

comments.author: İrtek
comments.text: Amazing idea! Want to chat while going over tasks. Let's make this happen!

comments.author: Nomura
comments.text: ✅ DONE! Chat widget implemented. Bottom-right floating widget, collapsible, mobile-responsive. WebSocket connected to gateway. Try it now!
